languages.text: "Они простят тебя. Не все и не сразу, но простят".
"They will forgive you. Not all of them, and not right away, but they will."
languages.original_text: "Они простят тебя. Не все и не сразу, но простят".

traits.locale_text: "They will forgive you. Not everyone, not right away, but they will."
"They will forgive you. Not everyone, not right away, but they will."
"They will forgive you. Not all of them, and not right away, but they will."
"They will forgive you. Not all of them, and not right away, but they will."
"They will forgive you. Not all of them, and not right away, but they will."

languages.text: “他们会原谅你的。也许不是所有人，也许不是今天——但他们终有一天会原谅你。”
languages.original_text: "They will forgive you. Not all of them, and not right away, but they will."

traits.locale_text: “他们会原谅你的。也许不是所有人，也许不是今天——但他们终有一天会原谅你。”

languages.text: «Te perdonarán. No todos, y desde luego no enseguida, pero lo harán».
languages.original_text: "They will forgive you. Not all of them, and not right away, but they will."

traits.locale_text: «Te perdonarán. No todos, y desde luego no enseguida, pero lo harán».

languages.text: « Ils vous pardonneront. Peut-être pas tous, et il faudra leur laisser du temps, mais ils vous pardonneront. »
languages.original_text: "They will forgive you. Not all of them, and not right away, but they will."

traits.locale_text: « Ils vous pardonneront. Peut-être pas tous, et il faudra leur laisser du temps, mais ils vous pardonneront. »

languages.text: "Sie werden Euch verzeihen. Nicht alle und nicht sofort, aber sie werden es tun."
languages.original_text: "They will forgive you. Not all of them, and not right away, but they will."

traits.locale_text: "Sie werden Euch verzeihen. Nicht alle und nicht sofort, aber sie werden es tun."

languages.text: 「彼らはお前を許すだろう。全員は無理だろうし、今すぐとは言わないが、いずれはきっと」
languages.original_text: "They will forgive you. Not all of them, and not right away, but they will."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らはお前を許すだろう。全員は無理だろうし、今すぐとは言わないが、いずれはきっと」

languages.text: "Seni affedecekler. Belki hepsi değil, hemen de değil ama affedecekler."
languages.original_text: "They will forgive you. Not all of them, and not right away, but they will."

traits.locale_text: "Seni affedecekler. Belki hepsi değil, hemen de değil ama affedecekler."
